statements: SELECT * FROM personal_best_times;
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, best_time FROM personal_best_times;
SELECT event_name, swimmer_id, best_time FROM personal_best_times ORDER BY swimmer_id DESC;
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, best_time, achievement FROM personal_best_times WHERE best_time < 30.00;
SELECT * FROM personal_best_times WHERE achievement IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_name ASC, best_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM personal_best_times WHERE swimmer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, best_time FROM personal_best_times WHERE best_time < 30.00 ORDER BY best_time DESC;
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, best_time, achievement FROM personal_best_times WHERE event_name LIKE '100m%' AND achievement IS NOT NULL ORDER BY best_time ASC;
SELECT event_name, best_time FROM personal_best_times WHERE swimmer_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND best_time > 25.00;
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, best_time, achievement FROM personal_best_times WHERE best_time BETWEEN 20.00 AND 30.00 ORDER BY swimmer_id, best_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM personal_best_times;
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, best_time FROM personal_best_times ORDER BY swimmer_id DESC;
SELECT event_name, best_time FROM personal_best_times WHERE swimmer_id = 1;
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, best_time FROM personal_best_times WHERE best_time < '00:30:00';
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name FROM personal_best_times WHERE date_achieved > '2022-01-01';
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, best_time, date_achieved FROM personal_best_times WHERE swimmer_id = 1 ORDER BY date_achieved DESC
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, best_time FROM personal_best_times WHERE best_time < '00:30:00'
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, best_time FROM personal_best_times WHERE event_name LIKE '50m%'
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, best_time, date_achieved FROM personal_best_times WHERE swimmer_id = 3 AND event_name = '100m Freestyle'

SELECT personal_best_times.swimmer_id, achievements.achievement_name, achievements.date_achieved FROM personal_best_times JOIN achievements ON personal_best_times.swimmer_id = achievements.swimmer_id;
SELECT * FROM personal_best_times ORDER BY date_achieved DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, timing FROM personal_best_times WHERE timing > 60;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE earned_medal = TRUE;
SELECT swimmer_id, full_name, birth_date FROM swimmers WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM personal_best_times WHERE event_name LIKE '%freestyle%' ORDER BY timing ASC;
SELECT * FROM personal_best_times WHERE swimmer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, timing FROM personal_best_times WHERE timing >= 50 ORDER BY timing DESC;
SELECT full_name, birth_date, nationality FROM swimmers WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT swimmer_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE earned_medal = TRUE ORDER BY achievement_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, timing, DATE_FORMAT(date_achieved,'%M %d, %Y') AS formatted_date FROM personal_best_times ORDER BY date_achieved ASC;
SELECT * FROM Swimmers;
SELECT full_name, age FROM Swimmers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT swimmer_id, event_name, time FROM PersonalBestTimes ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT id, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM Achievements WHERE swimmer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT medal_type, event_name, date_awarded FROM Medals WHERE medal_type='Gold' AND date_awarded>'2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, age, country FROM Swimmers WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PersonalBestTimes WHERE time < 60.00 AND event_name LIKE '%freestyle%' ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT full_name, gender, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM Swimmers JOIN Achievements ON Swimmers.id = Achievements.swimmer_id WHERE date_achieved BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_achieved DESC;
SELECT Swimmers.full_name, Medals.medal_type, Medals.date_awarded FROM Swimmers JOIN Medals ON Swimmers.id = Medals.swimmer_id WHERE medal_type = 'Gold' ORDER BY date_awarded DESC;
SELECT * FROM Swimmers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND country IN ('USA', 'Canada') ORDER BY full_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Swimmers;
SELECT name, age, team FROM Swimmers WHERE age >= 20;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT swimmer_id, event_id, record_time FROM Records WHERE record_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Swimmers WHERE team='TeamA';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Records WHERE record_time > '00:30:00' ORDER BY record_time DESC;
SELECT swimmer_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM Achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM Teams WHERE team_name LIKE '%Swim%';
